title: Finovers - Account Solutions
shortDescription: Welcome to Finovers, your reliable partner for managing and maintaining your company's accounting and finance details. We provide a range of services aimed at simplifying your financial operations and ensuring accuracy, compliance, and efficiency.

title: Xpendito - Best for Tracking Expenses
shortDescription: Our app is designed to be user-friendly and intuitive, making it easy for anyone to use, regardless of their financial knowledge or experience. Whether you're a student trying to manage your monthly budget, a professional looking to track business expenses, or someone simply looking to gain a better understanding of where your money is going, our app is the perfect solution.

title: General Store
shortDescription: This is an E-Commerce web application for the general store. Where we can view products and add them into favorites, carts, and place orders for the future. Users can add a product in favourite or cart as a guest and after login, this item will Marge with the logged users.
